tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE QuantumHardwareData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    hardware_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantum_bits INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE QuantumMeasurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    measurement_value FLOAT,
    measurement_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES QuantumDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    update_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    hardware_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);
